message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this fantastic product with you. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to you is $15000. What do you think?

I appreciate your offer, but I'm not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me is $8000. What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11500. This is still a great deal, considering its true value to you is $15000. What do you think?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $10500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me is $8000. What do you think?

I understand you're still hesitant, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $11000. This is my final offer, as I'm getting close to considering other buyers. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time and offer $10250 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me is $8000. What do you think?

I understand you're still trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $10800. This is my best offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time and offer $9900 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me is $8000. What do you think?
